item.title: 美国银行第四季度投资银行业务利润大增
item.description: 随着交易加速，投资银行业务收入激增，预计美国最大的银行将在下周公布第四季度利润增长情况。【原文：The largest U.S. banks are expected to report bigger fourth quarter profits next week, fueled by a surge in investment banking revenue as dealmaking accelerates.】

item.title: 韩国报纸称高通公司正与三星电子洽谈合约制造事宜
item.description: 韩国经济日报》周三援引美国高通公司首席执行官克里斯蒂安诺-阿蒙的话报道，高通公司正在与三星电子就两纳米芯片的合同制造进行谈判。【原文：Qualcomm is in talks with Samsung Electronics over contract manufacturing of two-nanometre chips, the U.S. company's CEO Cristiano Amon was quoted by the Korea Economic Daily as saying on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国-委内瑞拉石油协议激怒中国，推动油价下跌
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府表示已说服委内瑞拉从北京转移供应并进口价值高达 20 亿美元的禁运原油之后，全球石油价格下跌，中国谴责美国恃强凌弱。【原文：Global oil prices fell and China denounced the U.S. as a bully after President Donald Trump's administration said it had persuaded Venezuela to divert supplies from Beijing and import up to $2 billion worth of embargoed crude.】

item.title: 策略浮现：MSCI搁置将加密货币储备公司排除在指数之外的计划
item.description: 亿万富翁迈克尔·赛勒创立的比特币公司Strategy Group Holdings周三盘前交易中股价上涨6%，此前明晟公司（MSCI）取消了将这家比特币持有巨头及其他加密货币资产管理公司排除在其指数之外的计划。【原文：Shares of billionaire Michael Saylor's Strategy rose 6% in premarket trading on Wednesday, after MSCI dropped a plan to exclude the bitcoin hoarder and other crypto treasury firms from its indexes.】

item.title: 多伦多房屋销售连续第三个月下滑，经济不确定性持续发酵
item.description: 多伦多地区房地产委员会周三公布的数据显示，受经济不确定性影响，购房者持观望态度，导致大 Toronto 地区12月房屋销量连续第三个月下滑，房价亦出现下跌。【原文：Greater Toronto Area home sales fell for a third straight month in December and prices declined as economic uncertainty kept homebuyers on the sidelines, Toronto Regional Real Estate Board data showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 三星电子将购买 17.3 亿美元股票用于员工补偿
item.description: 三星电子周三表示，将收购价值 2.5 万亿韩元（17.3 亿美元）的自有股票，用于员工和高管薪酬。【原文：Samsung Electronics on Wednesday said it would acquire 2.5 trillion won ($1.73 billion) worth of its own shares for employee and executive compensation.】

item.title: 中国智能手机制造商 Realme 将成为 OPPO 子品牌
item.description: 中国智能手机制造商 Realme 周三表示，它将作为一个子品牌并入中国消费电子公司 Oppo，此举旨在为这两家共享母公司的公司集中资源、降低成本。【原文：Chinese smartphone maker Realme said on Wednesday that it was being integrated into Chinese consumer electronics company, Oppo, as a subbrand, in a move that aims to pool resources and cut costs for the two companies that share a parent firm.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车公司 12 月份销量增长 2
item.description: 总部位于瑞典的沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Cars）周三表示，12 月份共售出 75049 辆汽车，同比增长 2%。【原文：Sweden-based Volvo Cars sold 75,049 cars in December, up 2% from a year earlier, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 小米开始预售升级版 SU7 轿车，强调安全性能
item.description: 中国小米公司周三开始接受 SU7 车型升级版的预订，旨在提高该公司最畅销电动轿车在竞争激烈的中国市场的受欢迎程度。【原文：China's Xiaomi began taking pre-orders on Wednesday for an upgraded version of its SU7 model, aiming to boost the popularity of the company's best-selling electric sedan in the highly competitive Chinese market.】

item.title: 博思格钢铁公司投资者寻求提高 90 亿美元收购要约的价格
item.description: 博思格钢铁公司（BlueScope Steel）的投资者表示，他们希望SGH和美国钢铁动力公司（Steel Dynamics）对该公司提出的132亿澳元（约合89.2亿美元）的收购出价能够提高，以赢得他们对出售澳大利亚最大钢铁制造商的支持。【原文：BlueScope Steel investors said they are hoping a A$13.2 billion ($8.92 billion) buyout bid for the company from SGH and U.S.-based Steel Dynamics will be raised to win their backing to sell Australia's largest steelmaker.】

item.title: 早间竞标石油战利品
item.description: 洛基-斯威夫特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rocky Swift】

item.title: 据《金融时报》报道，雪佛龙与量子能源将竞购卢克石油价值220亿美元的全球资产
item.description: 据《金融时报》周三报道，美国石油巨头雪佛龙与私募股权集团量子能源合伙公司正联手竞购俄罗斯石油巨头卢克石油公司价值220亿美元的国际资产。【原文：U.S. oil major Chevron and private equity group Quantum Energy Partners are teaming up to bid for the international assets of Russian oil major Lukoil , which are valued at $22 billion, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道：捷克防务公司 CSG 临近首次公开募股（IPO）决定，这将增强并购战力
item.description: 捷克武器弹药公司捷克斯洛伐克集团（CSG）的所有者兼董事长米哈尔-斯特纳德（Michal Strnad）告诉路透社记者，该公司已与银行讨论在可能的首次公开募股中发行约 15%的股份，但尚未作出决定。【原文：Czech arms and ammunition firm Czechoslovak Group (CSG) has discussed with banks floating around 15% of its shares in a potential initial public offering, with a decision yet to be reached, owner and Chair Michal Strnad told Reuters.】

item.title: 中国人工智能服务器领军企业 xFusion 聘请投资银行，迈出上市第一步
item.description: 监管机构披露的信息显示，中国领先的人工智能服务器供应商xFusion已聘请中信证券为首次公开募股做准备，华为（HWT.UL）的分拆公司xFusion也加入了投资者热捧人工智能的科技公司行列。【原文：China's leading AI server provider xFusion has hired Citic Securities in preparation for an initial public offering, regulatory disclosure showed, adding the Huawei (HWT.UL) spin-off to a list of tech firms tapping investor fervour for AI.】

item.title: 现代汽车股价上涨 15%，创下与英伟达合作的新高
item.description: 由于市场猜测现代汽车可能与英伟达（Nvidia）进行更深入的合作，现代汽车股价在周三的早盘交易中上涨了14.9%，创下历史新高，超过了基准KOSPI指数1.2%的涨幅。【原文：Shares of Hyundai Motor rallied on Wednesday by as much as 14.9% to hit a record high in morning trade, outperforming the benchmark KOSPI's 1.2% gain amid market speculation about a potential deeper tie-up with Nvidia.】

item.title: 日本称中国的军民两用产品出口禁令 "不可接受"，稀土成为靶心
item.description: 日本政府最高发言人周三表示，中国禁止向日本出口军民两用产品是 "绝对不可接受的，令人深感遗憾"，亚洲两大经济体之间的外交争端正在加剧。【原文：Japan's top government spokesperson said on Wednesday that China's ban on exports of dual-use items to the country was "absolutely unacceptable and deeply regrettable", as a diplomatic dispute between Asia's top two economies ramped up.】

item.title: 全球紧张局势加剧，原油暴跌，亚洲股市走低
item.description: 在亚洲交易中，原油期货下滑，资源类股攀升，因为市场消化了委内瑞拉政治动荡及其石油储备命运的影响。【原文：Crude futures slid and resource shares climbed in Asian trading as markets absorbed the impact of political upheaval in Venezuela and the fate of its petroleum reserves.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 11 月通胀放缓，但核心通胀保持稳定
item.description: 周三的数据显示，澳大利亚11月份消费者物价涨幅低于预期，但核心通胀显示出足够的粘性，投资者仍认为最早在下个月就有可能不得不加息。【原文：Australian consumer prices rose by less than forecast in November, data showed on Wednesday, but core inflation showed enough stickiness that investors still saw a risk interest rates would have to be hiked as early as next month.】

item.title: 联想与英伟达千兆级工厂合作，推出 Qira 平台，扩大人工智能产品阵容
item.description: 本周二，中国联想在拉斯维加斯消费电子展上发布了与英伟达（Nvidia）合作的人工智能云千亿国际娱乐，同时还展示了一系列其他产品，包括一个新的人工智能平台。【原文：China's Lenovo unveiled an artificial intelligence cloud gigafactory with Nvidia at the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas on Tuesday, while also showcasing a slew of other products, including a new AI platform.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：中国审查 Meta 收购人工智能初创公司 Manus 的交易
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周二援引两位熟悉内情的人士的话报道称，中国官员正在审查 Meta 公司斥资 20 亿美元收购人工智能初创公司 Manus 的交易，因为该交易可能违反了技术控制规定。【原文：Chinese officials are reviewing Meta's $2 billion acquisition of artificial intelligence startup Manus for possible technology control violations, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday, citing two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易员等待美国关键经济数据，美元走势徘徊
item.description: 周三，在一系列可能为美联储利率前景定调的美国经济数据公布之前，美元汇率在狭窄区间内震荡，交易商认为这些数据对货币的影响要大于当前的地缘政治紧张局势。【原文：The dollar hugged tight ranges on Wednesday ahead of a slew of U.S. economic data that could set the tone for the Federal Reserve's rate outlook, something traders consider more consequential for currencies than ongoing geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 特朗普称委内瑞拉将向美国输送石油后，WTI 原油跌幅扩大
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示委内瑞拉将向美国 "上缴 "3000 万至 5000 万桶受制裁石油之后，美国原油周三下跌超过 1%。【原文：U.S. crude fell more than 1% on Wednesday after U.S. President Donald Trump said Venezuela will be "turning over" 30 million to 50 million barrels of sanctioned oil to the United States.】

item.title: 巴克莱收购稳定币结算公司 Ubyx
item.description: 英国巴克莱银行（Barclays）周三表示，该行已购买了美国稳定币结算公司 Ubyx 的股份，这是其首次进行此类投资，也是其探索 "新形式数字货币 "计划的一部分。【原文：Barclays has bought a stake in U.S. stablecoin-settlement company Ubyx, its first such investment and part of its plans to explore "new forms of digital money", the British bank said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，聊天平台 Discord 将秘密申请在美国上市
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，聊天平台 Discord 已秘密申请在美国进行首次公开募股。【原文：Chat platform Discord confidentially filed for an initial public offering in the United States, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: MSCI 放弃排除数字资产财资公司的计划，将启动更广泛的审查
item.description: 摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI）周二表示，将不会继续提出将数字资产财务公司（DATCO）排除在其指数之外的建议，但将就如何对待非经营性公司展开更广泛的咨询。【原文：MSCI said on Tuesday it will not proceed with a proposal to exclude digital asset treasury companies, or DATCOs, from its indexes, but will launch a broader consultation on how non-operating companies should be treated.】

item.title: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司将新任首席执行官阿贝尔的薪酬提高到 2500 万美元
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）周二表示，已将新任首席执行官格雷格-阿贝尔（Greg Abel）的薪酬提高到 2500 万美元，远远超过其前任沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）四十多年来接受的 10 万美元年薪。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway said on Tuesday it raised the salary of new Chief Executive Greg Abel to $25 million, far exceeding the $100,000 annual salary that his predecessor Warren Buffett accepted for more than four decades.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，KKR 将以 10 亿美元估值收购体育投资商 Arctos
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，全球投资公司 KKR 已同意收购 Arctos Partners，该交易对这家专注于体育的私募股权公司的估值约为 10 亿美元。【原文：Global investment firm KKR has agreed to acquire Arctos Partners in a deal that values the sports-focused private equity firm at about $1 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国法院似乎对 Meta、社交媒体公司切断成瘾诉讼的请求持怀疑态度
item.description: 美国一家上诉法院周二似乎倾向于允许指控主要社交媒体平台的设计会让年轻用户上瘾的诉讼继续进行，而几位法官则质疑现在考虑这些公司是否可以免于此类指控是否为时过早。【原文：A U.S. appeals court on Tuesday appeared inclined to allow lawsuits alleging major social media platforms were designed to be addictive for young users to proceed, as several judges questioned whether it was too early to consider whether the companies are immune from such claims.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司第四季度交付 91 架飞机
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）在周二提交的一份证券文件中说，2025 年第四季度交付了 91 架飞机，比上年同期增长了 21%。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer delivered 91 aircraft in the fourth quarter of 2025, up 21% from the same quarter the year before, the company said in a securities filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 交易日 全球股市无忧无虑
item.description: 周二，受人工智能乐观情绪的推动，S&P 500 指数和全球许多股指都创下了新高，而铜价也创下了新纪录，因为投资者正在为本周晚些时候的一系列美国就业数据做好准备。【原文：The S&P 500 and many stock indexes around the world clocked fresh highs on Tuesday, propelled by optimism around AI, while copper prices also hit fresh records, as investors brace for a flurry of U.S. jobs data later this week.】
